title: Onboarding - SIM-Only Plan Activation
description: A customer has received their new SIM card for a SIM-only plan and needs to activate it.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for the ICCID number from the new SIM card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly captures the SIM card number.

tasks.description: Activate the SIM card in the billing system.
Instruct the customer to insert the SIM and restart their phone.
